name: Classic Pong - For Android Only
description:
Experience the classic game of Pong on your phone or tablet in a whole new way with smoother graphics than ever before and customizing options to personalize your game.

The UI is designed to minimize distractions and allow you to completely immerse yourself in the game. Don't like it? Change the background color and/or game color to your liking!

Try the seizure mode for a new experience in game play. (Warning: may be extremely harmful to those affected by epilepsy and related disorders).

Think your too good for Pong? Try playing the unbeatable Intellidroid mode! Or have your friends play and watch them lose their minds as they try over and over to score a point!

Coming Soon:
Player vs. Player mode
Playing over bluetooth capabilities
